attributes.action: Immigration:  Issue data protected spouse visa forms to avoid scam marriages.
attributes.additional_details: Once the form arrives and gets scanned,  application rejection notification should occur on the computer and automatic visa rejection text sent to spouse,  the form then destroyed. If immediate rejection  seems unjustified then there could instead be further investigation request that could occur on the system which will require the home office to call the sponsor to question the base of application cancellation.  This may avoid sponsors from being black mailed or threatened to sign the form.
attributes.background: FLR forms barcoded and scanned in the home office after completion.The sponsors passport number, finger print must be entered then contact details of the spouse, then sent off for  processing. If the spouse changes attitude during application. The application cancelled online by sponsor.
